footer.text: Gemini Chart Analyzer - Powered by Google Gemini AI

batchScanner.title: Batch Scanner
batchScanner.subtitle: Scan the entire market and find LONG/SHORT signals
batchScanner.scanningDescription: This process may take a few minutes. Please wait.

errors.scanError: Market scan failed. Possible causes: network connectivity issues, API rate limits, or server timeout. Please check your network connection, verify API permissions, and try again. {{details}}

chartAnalyzer.title: Chart Analyzer
chartAnalyzer.subtitle: Analyze technical charts with Google Gemini AI
chartAnalyzer.analyzingDescription: This process may take a few minutes. Please wait.

errors.analyzeError: Chart analysis failed. Possible causes: network connectivity issues, API rate limits, invalid symbol/timeframe, or insufficient data. Please check your network connection, verify the symbol exists and timeframe is valid, and try again. {{details}}

empty.title: No results
empty.description: No signals found matching the search criteria.

workflowDiagrams.title: Workflow Diagrams
workflowDiagrams.subtitle: Visualize the workflow of VotingAnalyzer and HybridAnalyzer

votingAnalyzer.title: Voting Analyzer
votingAnalyzer.description: Pure Voting System: All indicators calculate signals in parallel, then the system decides which symbols to keep.
votingAnalyzer.clickHint: Click on any node in the diagram to jump to its module details below

hybridAnalyzer.title: Hybrid Analyzer
hybridAnalyzer.description: Sequential Filtering + Voting: Symbols are filtered step-by-step to reduce processing load before the voting system is applied.
hybridAnalyzer.clickHint: Click on any node in the diagram to jump to its module details below
